<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Positioning Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=4815) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 146 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a two-handed melee weapon and your target is within your reach

</column>

---

With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position. Make a Strike with the required weapon. If you hit, you Reposition the target 5 feet.
